CatDescriptText: Sidney Hargrove was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Out" column published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 10, 1973, page 4, with question: "What do you think of the situation in Vietnam?" Answer reads: "I think it's a mess.  It's all uncalled for.  It doesn't have to be.  Why are they still killing people when they're supposed to have a settlement?"
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Sidney Hargrove wearing eyeglasses, turtleneck, and hat standing in front of Giant Eagle Market
